game.title: Saving the Princess
game.objective: Rescue Princess Rose from the clutches of the evil wizard
game.description: The evil wizard has kidnapped Princess Rose and taken her to his castle. You must brave the dangers of the castle and defeat the wizard to rescue the princess.

tasks.objective: Find the key to the castle
tasks.description: The key to the castle is hidden in the forest. Search for clues to locate it.

tasks.objective: Solve the riddles of the castle
tasks.description: The wizard has set up a series of riddles and puzzles to test the courage and wit of the adventurers. Solve them to progress further in the castle.
The wizard has placed powerful guardian monsters at different levels of the castle. Defeat them to reach Princess Rose's prison.
Face the ultimate challenge and defeat the evil wizard to rescue Princess Rose.
